title: Brownstein Group
content: A redesign of Brownstein Group's website, I programmed the front-end and back-end of the site. Lots of animations.

title: National Lacrosse League
content: A complete redesign and rebuild of the NLL website. I programmed the front-end and most of the back-end of this site in Wordpress. It uses the PointStreak API to pull in live stats, games, and other info using JSON feeds accessed by PHP.

title: SageGlass
content: A complete re-branding of SageGlass, a type of glass that you can tint on demand. This site was designed to showcase various features of SageGlass, using video and CSS animations to simulate the product. I programmed the front-end and added to/revised the back-end, which is built on Drupal.
